name: pjrn

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cch), wceq(crn(cfv(cpjh, c0)), c0), wfo(cfv(cpjh, c0), chba, c0))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ CH, ran((projh ` c0))= c0, ((projh ` c0): ~H ↠ c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cch), wceq(crn(cfv(cpjh, c0)), c0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cch), wfo(cfv(cpjh, c0), chba, c0))
-| wi(wfo(cfv(cpjh, c0), chba, c0), wceq(crn(cfv(cpjh, c0)), c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CH → ran((projh ` c0))= c0)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CH →((projh ` c0): ~H ↠ c0))
⊣ (((projh ` c0): ~H ↠ c0)→ ran((projh ` c0))= c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cch), wceq(crn(cfv(cpjh, c0)), c0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cch), wfo(cfv(cpjh, c0), chba, c0))
-| wi(wfo(cfv(cpjh, c0), chba, c0), wceq(crn(cfv(cpjh, c0)), c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CH → ran((projh ` c0))= c0)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CH →((projh ` c0): ~H ↠ c0))
⊣ (((projh ` c0): ~H ↠ c0)→ ran((projh ` c0))= c0)

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cch), wfo(cfv(cpjh, c0), chba, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cch), wceq(crn(cfv(cpjh, c0)), c0))
-| wi(wfo(cfv(cpjh, c0), chba, c0), wceq(crn(cfv(cpjh, c0)), c0))

body.origin: |- wi(wfo(cfv(cpjh, c0), chba, c0), wceq(crn(cfv(cpjh, c0)), c0))

comment: The range of a projection. Part of Theorem 26.2 of [Halmos] p. 44. (Contributed by NM, 24-Apr-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
